Feature Notes:
Ancestors: Has the Whispers Of Weakness and Curse Of Ancestral Meddling features
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Battle: Has the Oracular Warning and Curse Of The Mortal Warrior features
Bones: Has the Nudge The Scales and Curse Of Living Death features
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature

Human Heritage: 1 selection

Mystery: 1 selection
Oracle Feats: 10 selections
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Tempest: Has the Foretell Harm and Curse Of Inclement Headwinds features
Adopted Ancestry (Tripkee): May take Tripkee ancestry feats
Curse Of Engulfing Flames: Shows aspects of heat and flame
Curse Of Inclement Headwinds: Shows aspects of weather
Curse Of Living Death: Shows aspects of death and decay
Curse Of Outpouring Life: Presence causes minor healing and vitality effects
Curse Of The Mortal Warrior: Smells of steel and blood and appears more muscular than actual
Curse Of The Sky's Call: Has eyes that glow and hair and clothing that floats
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Shows effects of overflowing knowledge
Oracular Curse: Suffers from a mystery-linked curse
Oracular Warning: (F) R20' Gives allies +2 initiative, or +3 or +4 initiative with cursebound 2 or 3, and 10 temporary Hit Points for 1 min at the start of initiative
Pet: Has a Tiny animal minion with the same level, modifiers, and AC as self, 100 Hit Points, low-light vision, 25' Speed, and creature-specific abilities
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)

Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Tempest: Skill Trained (Nature)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Cursebound inflicts a penalty to Perception of equal severity
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Glean Lore: (1) Successful Religion check gives one true and one false piece of info about a desired topic, critical success gives accurate info or a clue, and failure or critical failure gives one or two pieces of incorrect info or misleading clues
Group Aid: (F) After Aiding an ally, Aids another on the same skill
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Spiritual Sense: Makes an automatic check to find spirit creatures while exploring, and can notice spirits within 30' that are up to 5' deep within objects
Thousand Visions: (F) R30' Can target concealed or hidden creatures with no flat check or a DC 5 flat check, does not suffer off-guard from hidden creatures, and senses beyond 30' become imprecise, for 1 min
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 228 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (5 max); expert) Class DC: Oracle: 36 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Club (+28 1d6+4 B R10'; strength; expert); Crossbow (+29 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Gauntlet (+28 1d4+4 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Bastard Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Bastard Sword)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Curse Of Ancestral Meddling: Cursebound inflicts clumsy of equal severity
Curse Of Engulfing Flames: Cursebound inflicts persistent fire damage of equal severity
Curse Of Inclement Headwinds: Cursebound 2 inflicts -2 ranged attacks
Curse Of Outpouring Life: Regains 20 * cursebound severity fewer Hit Points from magical healing
Curse Of The Sky's Call: Cursebound inflicts enfeebled of equal severity
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Cursebound 4 prevents communication and inflicts stupefied 1
Debilitating Dichotomy: (2) R30' Inflicts 27d6 HP mental on self and target (save basic Fortitude; self improves save by 1 step; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1)
Forestall Curse: (F) Subsequent cursebound ability use does not increase cursebound severity once per day
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +27 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +29 (dexterity; expert); Will: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Save Notes:
Greater Mysterious Resolve: Save Legendary (Will)
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Mysterious Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Premonition's Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Curse Of Inclement Headwinds: Cursebound 1 and 3 inflict weakness 2 and weakness 25 to electricity
Curse Of Living Death: Cursebound 1, 2, 3, and 4 inflict weakness 2 to vitality and void damage, -1 Fortitude saves, weakness 25 to vitality and void damage, and -2 Fortitude saves
Curse Of The Mortal Warrior: Cursebound 1, 2, 3, and 4 inflict weakness 2 to spell damage, -1 saves vs. spells, weakness 20 to spell damage, and -2 saves vs. spells
Curse Of The Sky's Call: Suffers a penalty vs. forced movement equal to the current cursebound severity
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Cursebound inflicts a penalty to Will saves of equal severity
Divine Aegis: (R) Gives self +1 vs. non-divine magical effects and -1 vs. divine effects until the start of the next turn
Greater Mysterious Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes, critical failures on Will saves are normal failures, and failed Will saves inflict half damage
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Mysterious Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes

Cosmos: Knows the Spray Of Stars divine spell
Domain Acumen (Darkness): Knows the Cloak Of Shadow divine spell
Domain Fluency (Darkness): Knows the Darkened Sight divine spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Divine)
Flames: Knows the Incendiary Aura divine spell
Gifted Power: +1 rank 9 spell slot for a mystery granted spell
Greater Revelation (Ancestors): Knows the Ancestral Form divine spell
Greater Revelation (Battle): Knows the Revel In Retribution divine spell
Greater Revelation (Bones): Knows the Claim Undead divine spell

Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Divine)
Life: Knows the Life Link divine spell
Lore: Knows the Brain Drain divine spell
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Divine)
Oracular Clarity: Has 1 10th-rank spell slot
Oracular Providence: +1 10th rank spell slot
Revelation Spells: Has a focus pool
Tempest: Knows the Tempest Touch divine spell
Bespell Strikes: (F) After casting a non-cantrip spell, causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of the turn once per turn; the damage type is force or the same type as the spell inflicted
Blaze Of Revelation: (F) While at cursebound 4, can cast 1 revelation spell each rd without spending Focus Points for 1 min; afterward, must attempt a DC 40 Fortitude save, suffering drained 2 until next daily prep, drained 4 until next daily prep, or death on success, failure, or critical failure
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Conduit Of Void And Vitality: (2) Casting a 3-action signature Harm or Heal restores or inflicts on 1 target additional Hit Points equal to 1d8 * cursebound severity
Diverse Mystery: Can cast an initial or advanced revelation spell from another mystery, increasing cursebound severity and suffering the mystery's cursebound 1 effects
Divine Access: Can learn 3 cleric spells from a deity with a shared domain
Divine Effusion: Can cast 2 additional spells of different ranks after spell slots in each rank are exhausted once per day
Epiphany At The Crossroads: (F) While dying, gains the effects of an Augury, loses the dying condition, gains a wounded level, regains 40 Hit Points, and can Stand once per day
Extreme Curse: Can tolerate cursebound severity 4
Foretell Harm: (F) Target of a damaging non-cantrip spell takes additional damage equal to the spell rank at the beginning of its turn once per target per day once per rd
Knowledge Of Shapes: (F) Uses Reach Spell or Widen Spell
Lighter Than Air: Cursebound gives 25' fly Speed, or 35' fly Speed with cursebound 3
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-rank Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-rank during Seek
Major Curse: Can tolerate cursebound severity 3
Meddling Futures: (F) Randomly gives self a Strike with +1 attack and +2 damage, a +1 Perception check or skill action, a spell cast with increased damage or healing equal to the spell rank, or a +10' Stride; cursebound 3 increases these bonuses to +6 damage, +2 check, spell rank + 3 damage or healing, or +20' Speed, and using a different action requires a successful DC 6 flat check
Mysterious Repertoire: Knows 1 spell from a different tradition
Mystery Conduit: (F) Subsequent casting of an instantaneous spell of up to rank 5 does not expend a spell slot
Nudge The Scales: (1) R30' Target regains 42 Hit Points
Nudge The Scales: Can choose during daily prep to be healed by vitality healing or void healing
Oracle Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Paradoxical Mystery: Can select 1 spell from an accessible domain during daily prep to cast as a revelation spell
Portentous Spell: (1) Subsequent spell inflicts -2 on reaction attacks and skill tests, plus fascinated until the start of the next turn on any targets that suffer damage or fail to save
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of rank 7 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Read Disaster: 10 min contemplation reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally bad
Revelation's Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Roll The Bones Of Fate: (1) R30' Randomly causes 1 of 4 effects once per 10 min: gives self or an ally the better of two rolls on the next attack or skill check; inflicts on a target the worse of two rolls on the next attack or skill check (save Will negates); both of the previous; forces all within range to roll twice on their next attack or skill check, giving the better roll if the higher is even and the worse if it is odd
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Surging Might: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to spirit, vitality, and void
The Dead Walk: (2) R30' 2 spell attacks (cursebound 2 or 3 gives 3 or 4 attacks) each inflict 4d6 HP spirit
Trial By Skyfire: (1) 10' emanation inflicts 2d6 HP fire (cursebound 3 inflicts 4d6 HP in a 15' emanation) (save basic Reflex) at the end of each turn for 1 min; a Sustain supresses the effects for 1 rd
Water Walker: Cursebound 1 allows Striding across liquids to a solid destination, and cursebound 2 allows walking on liquids as if they were solid
Waters Of Creation: (2) 15' emanation restores 10d6 Hit Points (cursebound 3 restores 10d8 Hit Points)
Whispers Of Weakness: (1) R60' Reveals target weakness and its lowest saving throw and gives self +2 to the next attack before the end of the turn once per target per day
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
